byline.contributor: William Neuman contributed reporting from Vista Hermosa, Colombia.

abstract: Drug Enforcement Administration is investigating senior Venezuelan officials as part of broad probe into distribution of cocaine in Western Hemisphere
lead_paragraph: It is unlikely the authorities in Caracas would hand over high-profile leaders if they were charged, given the strained relations with America.

headline.main: U.S. Focuses on Top Venezuelan Officials in a Broad Cocaine Inquiry
headline.print_headline: U.S. Focuses on Top Venezuelan Officials in a Broad Cocaine Inquiry

snippet: It is unlikely the authorities in Caracas would hand over high-profile leaders if they were charged, given the strained relations with America.
